label: reportingStandard
comment: The reporting standard (eg GHG Protocol, IFRS S2, ESRS, etc) against which this product emissions performance is assessed.

rangeIncludes.comment: A standard (eg ISO 14000) that specifies the criteria for conformance.

domainIncludes.comment: Product specific characteristics.  This class is an extension point for industry specific product characteristics or performance information such as clothing size or battery capacity.
